thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 86 of 1961
thread.title: jim pearson

author: jim pearson
title: jim pearson
text: Just used Tyres on the Drive for the first time. I can't fault them, came when they said they would, the fitter `Sean was very polite and replaced two front tyres without any problems. A very efficient service, great communication from the minute I placed the order on line to the emailed invoice that arrived on completion. Their prices are also very competitive and I will have no hesitation using them in the future!
